step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms stretched overhead and fingers open. Keep this position for the next step.
You're doing well stretching your arms back overhead. Ensure you're fully extending them as you exhale and relax.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together while pushing down. Remember to inhale during this part.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Continue to relax your muscles in this position.
You've completed the repetitions! Focus on maintaining a comfortable posture throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead, make a fist while pushing down, and then relax as you stretch back up. Keep up the good work!
